pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sphinx-immaterial-igwnThis project defines the IGWN Material theme for Sphinx, an extension of[Sphinx Immaterial](https://jbms.github.io/sphinx-immaterial/).To install this package:```shellpython -m pip install sphinx-immaterial-igwn```To use the theme add the following to your `conf.py`:```pythonextensions = ["sphinx_immaterial_igwn"]html_theme = "sphinx_immaterial_igwn"```For full details, see <https://computing.docs.ligo.org/igwn-material/sphinx/>.
